item.title: index
item.description: Benvenuto nella mia Wiki Soviet-2089 Questa è la homepage del mio sito generato con Quartz!.

item.title: Welcome to Quartz 4
item.description: Quartz is a fast, batteries-included static-site generator that transforms Markdown content into fully functional websites.

item.title: Setting up your GitHub repository
item.description: First, make sure you have Quartz cloned and setup locally. Then, create a new repository on GitHub.com.

item.title: Favicon
item.description: This plugin emits a favicon.ico into the public folder. It creates the favicon from icon.png located in the quartz/static folder.

item.title: Reader Mode
item.description: Reader Mode is a feature that allows users to focus on the content by hiding the sidebars and other UI elements.

item.title: Explorer
item.description: Quartz features an explorer that allows you to navigate all files and folders on your site. It supports nested folders and is highly customizable.

item.title: Breadcrumbs
item.description: Breadcrumbs provide a way to navigate a hierarchy of pages within your site using a list of its parent folders.

item.title: Higher-Order Layout Components
item.description: Quartz provides several higher-order components that help with layout composition and responsive design.

item.title: Custom OG Images
item.description: The Custom OG Images emitter plugin generates social media preview images for your pages.

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Quartz is meant to be extremely configurable, even if you don’t know any coding.
